body: Some half-elves are born of elves adapted to life on or near the water. These half-elves gain a +4 racial bonus on Swim checks, can always take 10 while swimming, and may choose Aquan as a bonus language. This racial trait replaces the adaptability and multitalented racial traits.
name: Water Child
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Elves/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Water Child
